Container.Name: whoogle
Container.Overview: Get Google search results, but without any ads, javascript, AMP links, cookies, or IP address tracking. Easily deployable in one click as a Docker app, and customizable with a single config file. Quick and simple to implement as a primary search engine replacement on both desktop and mobile.
Container.Category: Cloud: Tools: Other: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:Other
